text: Pazar3 is an online marketplace founded in 2006. Payments between buyer and seller are made offline. == Countries == * North Macedonia — Pazar3.mk * Albania — MerrJep.al * Kosovo — MerrJep.com * Serbia — Mojtrg.rs * Montenegro — Mojtrg.me == References == *http://www.time.mk/r/c/7aa7f6ae98/ *http://bi.mk/pazar3-deset-godini-najsnabden-pazar-vo-makedonija/ *http://bi.mk/pazar3-mk-vovede-nova-funkcija-za-komuniciranje-pazar3-chat/ *http://www.fakulteti.mk/news/16-07-18/makedoncite_najmnogu_kupuvaat_polovni_korsi_i_pezho_206_do_2_000_evra.aspx Category:Internet properties established in 2006 Category:Companies of North Macedonia Category:North Macedonian companies established in 2006
title: Pazar3
